cyclone.name: LAURA
cyclone.current_location: about 525 miles SE of Lake Charles, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: moving west-northwest across the southeastern Gulf of Mexico, forecast to turn northwest then north-northwest toward the upper Texas and southwest Louisiana coasts
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: upper Texas / southwest Louisiana coast (near Lake Charles – Galveston area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch east of Intracoastal City to west of Morgan City, LA (Gulf Coast – not including Virgin Islands)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning San Luis Pass, TX to Intracoastal City, LA; Tropical Storm Warning Sargent, TX to San Luis Pass and east of Intracoastal City, LA to the Mouth of the Mississippi River; Storm-Surge Warning San Luis Pass, TX to the Mouth of the Mississippi River
weather_observation.impacted_coast: central and northwest Gulf of Mexico shoreline from Texas to Louisiana
